data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 51,900 people living in Biliran through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Biliran, Philippines
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Biliran words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Biliran, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Biliran be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Hanunoo people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Biliran, Philippines. Please, stir the 7,230 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Biliran who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary:
the state of Biliran, Philippines has a population of 51,900.

We estimate Biliran has 7,230 people who might know Jesus, 39,981 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,689 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Biliran, Philippines a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

location.name: Biliran
